item.title: FAQ
item.description: A few of your more frequently asked questions Error message: current file does not sequentially follow previous file When using chifra scrape indexer you may get the above message. What this means is a completely empty block was returned from the RPC. When I say completely empty, this means there’s not even a miner address. Our scraper thinks that every block must contain at least one address, but on some chains this is not true (for example, on some private chains).
